name: Generic Zombie Apocalypse Game Title
description:
Generic Zombie Apocalypse Game Title

is supposed to be a game about surviving for as long as you can.

Zombies spawn in one region and expand, trying to engulf the whole map while the player builds defenses to keep control.

Running out of recruiteable population, fear not: just forget your morality and decide to recruit up to 90% of your civilians. After all, everybody needs to do their part in protecting the rest of humanity.

Too many zombies, well... you could kill and burn everybody in a region that is about to be lost, so that they can't turn into zombies.

You can't win in this game, you can only survive longer.
